issue.title: [CF 849] Itemcooldowns not using correct texture
issue.body:
With the most recent versions (currently using r5 (gdf018b1) I always get the questionmark texture on icons tracking an item.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #849 | Raw

comments.body:
Could you provide an export string of an icon that this is happening to? I also need to know where the item being tracked by the icon you provide is (equipped? bags? bank? don't have?)

All mine are working OK.

Edited Jul 26, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

^1^T^SType^Sitem ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^N2^T ^SType^SITEMCD ^SOperator^S|= ^SName^SPotion`of`Mogu`Power ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SPotion`of`Mogu`Power ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SEnableStacks^B ^SShowTimer^B ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N59 ^t^N62302^S`| ^Sicon^^

The same happens with health stones. Both are consumable items in my bags.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

Fixed in 6.2.2-9-gc5d9072 (in case you were wondering, I switched from SVN to Git so that I could host TMW on GitHub https://github.com/ascott18/tellmewhen so that is why the versioning is suddenly different)

Edited Jul 28, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
